definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: People who are travelling will always try to make it  to San Francisco because of that diversity.
sentences.chinese: 因爲舊金山的多元化，人們會喜歡到這裏來旅行。
很好，白佬，我們正多元化成長。

sentences.english: Each hall categorizes different expo theme with a multi-faceted program of stage performances and folk art demonstrations.
sentences.chinese: 每個展廳有獨特且多元化的民間藝術以及舞臺表演。

sentences.english: Pluralistic societies require religions to coexist in proximity.
sentences.chinese: 多元化的社會要求諸種宗教的共同存在。

sentences.english: The last, artistic figures took fixed one as the principal, then, were replaced by pluralism.
sentences.chinese: 藝術形象由以特定人物爲主，轉爲形象的多元化。

sentences.english: The production of the company has completed the transition to pluralized development.
sentences.chinese: 經過不斷的發展，公司的產品由單一化向多元化發展。

sentences.english: San Francisco is so diverse. There's so many different neighborhoods and
sentences.chinese: 舊金山非常多元化。有很多不同風格的社區，

sentences.english: Neo-Vernacular is one of the architectural tendencies in the diversified world on contemporary.
sentences.chinese: 新鄉土建築是當代多元化世界的一種建築傾向。

sentences.english: Whether internal and external environment of enterprise can meet the demands of multi-operational business is essential for multi-operational business.
sentences.chinese: 企業在採用多元化戰略之前，必須客觀評估其必要性。

sentences.english: We have a very diverse campus of a lot of different types of people.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個多元化的校園，充滿了許多各式各樣的人。

sentences.english: All are trying to industrialize and diversify their economies.
sentences.chinese: 這些國家都正在努力實現工業化和經濟多元化。

sentences.english: A-One began executing the strategy of diversified developing in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 元貞於2009年推行集團多元化發展戰略。

sentences.english: The self-exploration ability of students is basically trained under the multiplicity teaching mode.
sentences.chinese: 在教學形式上多元化，注重培養學生的自主探究能力。

sentences.english: QZ Group is a multi-operation private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: QZ集團是一家多元化的民營企業。

sentences.english: Our end-market diversity and global reach help protect us. The turbulence will pass;
sentences.chinese: 我們的多元化市場和全球化業務能夠很好的保護我們。

sentences.english: This campaign is about building a different kind of politics.
sentences.chinese: 這個競選是在槊造多元化的健康政治新氣象。

definition: innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to facilitate/expedite/make convenient and fast/speed up
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
